description:
Keita Amano is a fan of one thing: gaming! Whether he’s on his phone or console, he just loves playing video games. And when the beautiful president of the game club, Karen Tendou, invites him to join, it seems like an EZ choice. Except, he declines! KO’d by the shock, Karen suddenly makes getting close to Amano her main quest. But she’s not the only one interested in him!

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: Gamers! Amano Keita to Seishun Continue
Gamers! Keita Amano and youth continue

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: School Club

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: E-Sports
tags.description: Prominently features professional video game competitions, tournaments, players, etc.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

node.description: Birth place: Hokkaido Prefecture, Japan Current residence: Tokyo, Japan [Website](http://sekina.exblog.jp/) | [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%91%B5%E3%81%9B%E3%81%8D%E3%81%AA)

Website Satou Tenshou is a Japanese animator, formerly belonging to Studio Wanpack, now a member of White Fox. His favourite anime are Sennen Joyuu, Kidou Senshi Gundam: Gyakushuu no Char, and Onegai Teacher. His nickname is MacGuyver. Having only served as an animator since Gad Guard he has shown to be proficient at displaying flowing stuff and its linework as well as excelling at storyboarding and portraying a good sense of camera action.

__Height:__ 157 cm (5'2")

[Profile](http://www.pro-baobab.jp/ladies/kanemoto_h/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/kanemoto-hisako)

Hisako Kanemoto was raised in Okayama Prefecture and attended Kamogata High School. Upon graduation, she enrolled in the voice acting course at the Vocational School of Art College Kobe. After completing her education in 2008, she moved to Tokyo and joined the training office associated with Production Baobab agency.

Early in her career, Kanemoto used the pseudonym _Juri Aikawa_. She made her anime debut in [Sora no Manimani](https://anilist.co/anime/6098) in 2009 under this name. After landing the lead role in [So Ra No Wo](https://anilist.co/anime/6802) To the following year, Kanemoto announced that she would be using her real name in her works moving forward. She was also cast as the title character in [Shinryaku! Ika Musume](https://anilist.co/anime/8557) later that year.

After a breakthrough 2010, Kanemoto was named Best New Actress at the 5th Seiyuu Awards. She has also voiced a number of mascot characters from Okayama Prefecture because of her origin.

Kanemoto made her debut as a solo musical artist in 2014 under Victor Entertainment with the album Fantastic Voyage.

On May 26, 2018 she announced on her official blog that she will take hiatus from professional activities for studying abroad. Her agency Production BAOBAB confirmed her return to work in March 2019.

She was discovered in 81 Produce's 3rd Seiyuu Audition in August, 2009, becoming one of the seven finalists amongst 1,109 who took initially part and won the excellence prize in the end. She made her debut in a minor role for the anime [Sasameki Koto](https://anilist.co/anime/6203).

(Source: AniDB)

node.description: Alternate names: Tenchuu Girls Date of birth: Dec 30, 2012 Website Associates in Arc Jewel. Appeared as trainees of Lovely★Doll (愛乙女★DOLL) on December 30, 2012. The unit name changed to Love☆Ken (らぶ☆けん) on December 24, 2013. The unit was separated into two: Love☆Ken Luce and Love☆Ken Stella on February 2, 2014, and they were Love☆Ken Luce. The unit name changed to Luce Twinkle Wink☆ on May 23, 2014. The unit was also Tenchuu Girls (天誅ガールズ) from Black Bullet with dancer Kanami Sawaguchi (Tenchuu Green) and Seiyuu Erika Kaiho (Tenchuu Black), and participated Animelo Summer Live 2015 -THE GATE- on August 29, 2015 as backdancers of fripSide. The unit major debut via NBC Universal Entertainment Japan with Koiiro♡Shikoukairo on November 25, 2015. Members: Usami Yukino (Twinkle Pink) - was Tenchuu Pink from Tenchuu Girls Saori Itayama (Twinkle Water Blue) - was Tenchuu Blue from Tenchuu Girls Kaho Higaki (Twinkle Lavender) - originally from C-ZONE, was Rusuban Pink from Rusuban Girls and Tenchuu Violet from Tenchuu Girls Saki Fukasawa (Twinkle Red) - originally from coro☆coro with Saki Fukasawa, was Tenchuu Red from Tenchuu Girls Megumi Nishikiori (Twinkle Yellow) - originally from Hydrangea, was Tenchuu Yellow from Tenchuu Girls (Source: MAL)
A Japanese arranger, composer, and member of the band [Jyukai](https://anilist.co/staff/100234/Jyukai).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mayuge1017)

A Tokyo Zoukei University graduate, he's one of the leading digital animators in the industry, with good character animation and catchy effects.

He is a "follower" of [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047/). In his university days, he was in the same circle as [Ryuu Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/133512/). They still have a good relationship and work with each other a lot. 

He is also a good friend of [Takahito Sakazume](https://anilist.co/staff/131945/), the two working often as a "two man production team."

Enokido is mainly known for his work on the Fate franchise, being both the action director for [Fate/Apocrypha](https://anilist.co/anime/98035/) and having directed the majority of the [Fate/Grand Order Commercials](https://anilist.co/anime/101184/).

**Doujin Circle:** PANDANIKU

Friends with co-worker and fellow Nitroplus artist [Ookuma Nekosuke](https://anilist.co/staff/117125/Nekosuke-Ookuma).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/namaniku_ATK) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/841771)

title.native: かぐや様は告らせたい～天才たちの恋愛頭脳戦～
俺を好きなのはお前だけかよ
ハイスコアガール II
この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！
ネトゲの嫁は女の子じゃないと思った?
理系が恋に落ちたので証明してみた。
ぼくたちは勉強ができない！
やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。 続 「きっと、女の子はお砂糖とスパイスと素敵な何かでできている。」
幼なじみが絶対に負けないラブコメ
ノーゲーム・ノーライフ
